address.docs:
**, int**: The I²C address of the driver. Defaults to `0x18`.

*See also: [ES8156](https://esphome.io/components/audio_dac/es8156.html#configuration-variables)*

i2c_id.docs:
The ID of the [I²C bus](https://esphome.io/components/i2c.html#i2c) the ES8156 is connected to.

*See also: [ES8156](https://esphome.io/components/audio_dac/es8156.html#configuration-variables)*
